question: What is the name of the main square in Leeuwarden, Netherlands where the market is held every Friday?
asked_question_translated: ¿Cómo se llama la plaza principal de Leeuwarden (Países Bajos) donde se celebra el mercado todos los viernes?
answer: La plaza principal de Leeuwarden donde se celebra el mercado todos los viernes se llama Wilhelminaplein.
answer_translated_eng: The main square in Leeuwarden where the market is held every Friday is called Wilhelminaplein.
